spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified primarily under the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit due to its outdoor setting on the water at the Port of LA. The image supports this environment. This spirit receives a high confidence score of 0.9.

"Structured & Disciplined" is applicable due to the focus on "technique" and "pause drills," emphasizing methodical progression and precision. However, since it's a cool-down rather than a primary technical session, the score is 0.6.

The workout lacks elements of high intensity, sports-specificity, or continuous flow, excluding "High-Energy & Intense," "Sport & Agility," and "Flow & Rhythm" spirits.
